metadata.title: CVE-2017-16042 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Growl adds growl notification support to nodejs. Growl before 1.10.2 does not properly sanitize input before passing it to exec, allowing for arbitrary command execution.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-16042` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-growl - 1.10.5-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-growl package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.5-2').
